localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The world is filled with too much noise around China. Meho (“very good” in Shanghainese) is here to help you contextualize China and equip you with hands-on Chinese skills, so you won’t miss out on the opportunities brought by the development of China.
blogPost.body: The world is filled with too much noise around China. Meho (“very good” in Shanghainese) is here to help you contextualize China and equip you with hands-on Chinese skills, so you won’t miss out on the opportunities brought by the development of China.
blogPost.title: Meho - Understand and communicate with China like never before!
blogPost.author: Charlie Liu

localize.description: 围绕着中国，世界充满了太多的噪音。美好（上海话 "很好"）在这里帮助你了解中国的背景，让你掌握实际的中文技能，从而不会错过中国发展带来的机遇。
localize.tagline: 了解并与中国进行前所未有的沟通!

localize.description: 圍繞着中國，世界充滿了太多的噪音。美好（上海話 "很好"）在這裏幫助你瞭解中國的背景，讓你掌握實際的中文技能，從而不會錯過中國發展帶來的機遇。
localize.tagline: 瞭解並與中國進行前所未有的溝通!

previous.title: Netflix already had 4 documentaries about the Suez Canal ship ready to go for tonight

localize.full_text: Netflix已经准备好了4部关于苏伊士运河号的纪录片，准备在今晚播出。
Netflix已經準備好了4部關於蘇伊士運河號的紀錄片，準備在今晚播出。

next.excerpt: Vantage is a cloud cost transparency platform currently supporting AWS. Securely link your AWS account in a click of a button and we'll automatically show you where your costs are coming from and how they're trending.
next.title: Vantage - A cloud cost transparency platform

localize.description: Vantage是一个云成本透明平台，目前支持AWS。只需点击一个按钮，就能安全地链接你的AWS账户，我们会自动向你展示你的成本来自哪里，以及成本的趋势。
Vantage是一個雲成本透明平臺，目前支持AWS。只需點擊一個按鈕，就能安全地鏈接你的AWS賬戶，我們會自動向你展示你的成本來自哪裏，以及成本的趨勢。
